problem.p: A projectile of mass \(3m\) is launched upward from the ground level. The projectile explodes at the top point of its trajectory which is a horizontal distance \(x\) from the launch point. As a result of the explosion, the projectile breaks into two fragments, of masses \(2m\) and \(m\), both initially travelling horizontally. The larger fragment ends up landing at the launch point.
How far from the launch point does the smaller fragment land?
